Package main

package main
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BIT707_AS3
    The main class of the application.
    CalendarView
    The Calendar Report form
    DatabaseConnection
    Class used to handle all connections and querries to and from the database.
    ListEmptyHeadingPanel
    An extention of the javax.swing.JPanel to indicate no tasks being present in the task list.
    Task
    The model in the the Model-View-Controller design pattern. Represents a task needing to be completed by the user
    TaskController
    The Controller class in the 'Model-View-Controller'. Handles all Task object manipulations (create, update, delete and view) from the application and too the database.
    TaskHeadingPanel
    An extention of the javax.swing.JPanel to add date headings to the Task List
    TaskItemPanel
    An extention of the javax.swing.JPanel to represent a single task object in the task list
    TaskListUI
    Main Application form
    TaskSingleton
    A Singleton class to store the current/max taskId to prevent duplicate id values in the application and database
